amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow for necessary regulations to be promulgated when the monthly national unemployment rate is above 6 percent in order to protect consumers against unintended consequences resulting from the Fair Credit Reporting Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to allow regulations that protect consumers under the Fair Credit Reporting Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 246 (Roll no. 523).
